subject: Books and Literature
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The greatest decline-and-fall stories involve the mightiest empires. In the mid-1960s, it was the Yankees’ turn to collapse while the rest of baseball delighted in their misfortune.
snippet: The greatest decline-and-fall stories involve the mightiest empires. In the mid-1960s, it was the Yankees’ turn to collapse while the rest of baseball delighted in their misfortune.
